# VZGenericMachineIdentifier

**Class**

An object that represents a unique identifier for a virtual machine.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZGenericMachineIdentifier
```

## Overview

Use the data representation in [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZGenericMachineIdentifier/dataRepresentation] to save the VM’s identifier. To restore a previously saved identifier use [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZGenericMachineIdentifier/init(dataRepresentation:)].

## Creating a Machine Identifier

- **init()**: Creates a new unique identifier for a VM.
- **init(dataRepresentation:)**: Creates a new unique identifier for a VM with the provided data.

## Getting Information About the Machine Identifier

- **dataRepresentation**: An opaque data representation of the VM’s identifier.

## Identifying the platform configuration

- **machineIdentifier**: A value that represents a unique identifier for the virtual machine.
- **isNestedVirtualizationEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether nested virtualization is in an enabled state.
- **isNestedVirtualizationSupported**: A Boolean value that describes whether the platform configuration supports nested virtualization.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
